meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fresh.
meanings.sent1: The freshnesses of the fruits at the market were evident from their vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: I love the freshnesses of the morning air when I go for a walk.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret to a delicious salad was the freshnesses of the ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter brought a sense of freshnesses to the room, lifting everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The freshnesses of the ocean breeze invigorated my senses as I stood on the shore.

meanings.definition: The state of being new or recently made.
meanings.sent1: The freshnesses of the paint on the walls made the room feel brand new.
meanings.sent2: The bakery always prided itself on the freshnesses of its pastries.
meanings.sent3: The freshnesses of the snowfall transformed the town into a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the freshnesses of spring in her latest painting.
meanings.sent5: The freshnesses of the ideas in the meeting brought a sense of innovation to the team.

meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasantly clean or pure.
meanings.sent1: After the rain, the freshnesses of the air was refreshing and invigorating.
meanings.sent2: The freshnesses of the laundry detergent left the clothes smelling delightful.
meanings.sent3: The cleanliness of the kitchen was evident in the freshnesses of the ingredients used.
meanings.sent4: The purity of her intentions shone through in the freshnesses of her actions.
meanings.sent5: The freshnesses of the mountain stream made it a perfect spot for a picnic.
